tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "8D15A27E477CCB6F9E133C8B01A62578", "The treasury tab allows the mayor to control several factors related to the node\'s finances and resources. The mayor can use the treasury tab to manage taxes, pay dues and create buy orders. ")
NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "59C9CCA04972A99680A8CDA7EB04A31C", "Track Node resources carefully so you can plan future building construction, upgrades, and maintenance.")
